titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1960) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2014 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-108, by Mr. Nugent.
The resolution makes in order only those further amendments printed in part B of this report and amendments en bloc described in Section 3 of this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 32.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 260.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 195 (Roll no. 220).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 189 (Roll no. 221).

bill.summary: 6/12/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1960 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2014).
